title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instruction: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces until cooked through, then set aside.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté onions until golden.
Add garlic and ginger paste, cook for 1 minute.
Stir in canned tomatoes and cook until softened, then blend into a smooth sauce if desired.
Return sauce to the pan, add cream, and simmer gently.
Add cooked chicken pieces to the sauce and heat through.
Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan.
